{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Home Connection Engineer",
  "description": "Project Expert Limited is a leading telecommunications solutions provider, delivering cutting-edge services to major telecom operators across Africa. With a strong presence in the industry, we specialize in network infrastructure deployment, managed services, power solutions, and digital transformation, ensuring seamless connectivity and operational excellence.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Home Connection Engineer

Job Locations:&nbsp;Kaduna &amp; Benin -&nbsp;Edo
Engagement Type: Temporary Contract
Start Date: Immediately after training
Training Commences: In 3 days (at each location)

Job Detail


	We are sourcing for Home Connection Engineers to join our team on a temporary contract engagement as part of our ongoing FTTH (Fiber-to-the-Home) projects.
	This is an excellent opportunity for beginners and individuals passionate about telecoms and ready to contribute to expanding fiber connectivity across Nigeria.


Requirements


	Minimum of OND in Engineering or related fields with&nbsp;1 year of Experience or basic understanding of Fiber installation/Home Connection installation.
	Good technical and troubleshooting skills
	Strong communication and customer service abilities
	Willingness to learn and work in a fast-paced environment.


Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their&nbsp;CV&nbsp;to:&nbsp;info@projectexpertlimited.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.",
  "datePosted": "2025-11-01",
  "validThrough": "2025-12-02",
  "employmentType": "Contract",
  "hiringOrganization": {
    "@type": "Organization",
    "name": "Project Expert Limited"
    
  },
  "jobLocation": {
    "@type": "Place",
    "address": {
      "@type": "PostalAddress",
       "postalCode": ". ",
       "addressRegion": ". ",
       "streetAddress": ". ",
      "addressLocality": "Edo, Kaduna",
      "addressCountry": "NG"
     
      
    }
  },
  "identifier": {
    "@type": "PropertyValue",
    "name": "",
    "value": "189728"
  },

    }

}



Home Connection Engineer Job at Project Expert Limited




        
    

        
        Project Expert Limited is a leading telecommunications solutions provider, delivering cutting-edge services to major telecom operators across Africa. With a strong presence in the industry, we specialize in network infrastructure deployment, managed services, power solutions, and digital transformation, ensuring seamless connectivity and operational excellence.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Home Connection Engineer

Job Locations: Kaduna & Benin - Edo
Engagement Type: Temporary Contract
Start Date: Immediately after training
Training Commences: In 3 days (at each location)

Job Detail
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We are sourcing for Home Connection Engineers to join our team on a temporary contract engagement as part of our ongoing FTTH (Fiber-to-the-Home) projects.
	This is an excellent opportunity for beginners and individuals passionate about telecoms and ready to contribute to expanding fiber connectivity across Nigeria.


Requirements


	Minimum of OND in Engineering or related fields with 1 year of Experience or basic understanding of Fiber installation/Home Connection installation.
	Good technical and troubleshooting skills
	Strong communication and customer service abilities
	Willingness to learn and work in a fast-paced environment.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: info@projectexpertlimited.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Web Developer (PHP, LARAVEL & MYSQL)",
  "description": "TAG Energy is an integrated service company offering a comprehensive range of oilfield products and support services in the Nigerian Oil and Gas Industry.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Web Developer (PHP, LARAVEL &amp; MYSQL)

Job Location:&nbsp;Lekki, Ajah - Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	TAG Energy is an integrated service company offering a comprehensive range of oilfield products and support services in the Nigerian Oil and Gas Industry.


Responsibilities


	Evaluating code to ensure items are properly structured and is compatible with browsers and operating devices.
	Determining the structure and design of web pages.
	Developing features to enhance the user experience.
	Developing designs with Canva or other design software.
	Ensuring web design is optimized for smartphones.
	Building reusable code for future use.
	Optimizing web pages for maximum speed and scalability.
	Utilizing a variety of markup languages to write web pages.
	Compile and analyze data, processes, and codes to troubleshoot problems and identify areas for improvement.
	Back up files from websites to local directories for recovery.
	Identifying problems uncovered by customer feedback and testing, and correcting


General Requirements


	BSc in Computer Science or related qualification from a reputable institution with at least 3 years experience in Web Development/Programming.
	Experience: Minimum of 3 - 6 years experience
	Good design knowledge with Canva or design software.
	Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite Applications (PowerPoint, Excel, Word, and Outlook), Networking Applications and web based applications.
	Strong written and oral communication skills with the ability to influence all levels of the organization and multicultural/international environment.
	Microsoft or Cisco Certification is an added advantage.
	Proven software development experience in PHP.
	Demonstrable knowledge of web technologies including HTML, MySQL, jQuery, CSS, Java, JavaScript, AJAX, PHP, Laravel, etc.


Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and aualified&nbsp;candidates send their CV&nbsp;to:&nbsp;recruit4talents1@gmail.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.",

  "validThrough": "2026-01-01",

Web Developer (PHP, LARAVEL & MYSQL) Job at TAG Energy




        
    

        
        TAG Energy is an integrated service company offering a comprehensive range of oilfield products and support services in the Nigerian Oil and Gas Industry.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Web Developer (PHP, LARAVEL & MYSQL)

Job Location: Lekki, Ajah - Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	TAG Energy is an integrated service company offering a comprehensive range of oilfield products and support services in the Nigerian Oil and Gas Industry.


Responsibilities
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Evaluating code to ensure items are properly structured and is compatible with browsers and operating devices.
	Determining the structure and design of web pages.
	Developing features to enhance the user experience.
	Developing designs with Canva or other design software.
	Ensuring web design is optimized for smartphones.
	Building reusable code for future use.
	Optimizing web pages for maximum speed and scalability.
	Utilizing a variety of markup languages to write web pages.
	Compile and analyze data, processes, and codes to troubleshoot problems and identify areas for improvement.
	Back up files from websites to local directories for recovery.
	Identifying problems uncovered by customer feedback and testing, and correcting


General Requirements


	BSc in Computer Science or related qualification from a reputable institution with at least 3 years experience in Web Development/Programming.
	Experience: Minimum of 3 - 6 years experience
	Good design knowledge with Canva or design software.
	Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite Applications (PowerPoint, Excel, Word, and Outlook), Networking Applications and web based applications.
	Strong written and oral communication skills with the ability to influence all levels of the organization and multicultural/international environment.
	Microsoft or Cisco Certification is an added advantage.
	Proven software development experience in PHP.
	Demonstrable knowledge of web technologies including HTML, MySQL, jQuery, CSS, Java, JavaScript, AJAX, PHP, Laravel, etc.


Method of Application 
Interested and aualified candidates send their CV to: recruit4talents1@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Health, Safety, and Environment (HSE) Manager",
  "description": "Fort Knox Outsourcing Limited -&nbsp;Our client, a leading player in the construction and engineering sector, is recruiting proactive and experienced candidates to develop, implement, and maintain effective safety policies and programs across all project sites in the capacity below:

Job Position:&nbsp;&nbsp;Health, Safety, and Environment (HSE) Manager

Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

About the Role


	The ideal candidate will have 4 - 5 years of relevant experience in HSE management, ensuring compliance with local regulations, company standards, and international best practices to promote a safe and sustainable work environment.


Key Responsibilities


	Develop, implement, and monitor HSE policies, systems, and procedures across project sites.
	Conduct risk assessments, safety audits, and inspections to identify potential hazards and ensure preventive measures.
	Promote a strong safety culture through employee training, awareness programs, and engagement initiatives.
	Ensure compliance with regulatory standards (DPR, NESREA, ISO, OSHA, etc.) and company safety policies.
	Investigate incidents, accidents, and near misses; prepare reports and recommend corrective actions.
	Coordinate emergency response plans and ensure readiness for workplace incidents.
	Liaise with contractors, regulatory bodies, and project managers on all safety-related matters.
	Maintain accurate HSE documentation and prepare periodic reports for management review.


Qualifications &amp; Experience


	Bachelor&rsquo;s Degree in Environmental Science, Engineering, Occupational Health &amp; Safety, or a related field.
	4 - 5 years of proven experience in a similar HSE role (preferably within construction, oil &amp; gas, or engineering projects).
	Certification in NEBOSH, IOSH, ISO 45001, or equivalent is a strong advantage.
	Excellent knowledge of HSE regulations, audits, and risk management procedures.
	Strong leadership, communication, and team coordination skills.
	Ability to influence and drive compliance across all organizational levels.


What We Offer


	Competitive compensation and benefits package.
	Exposure to high-impact projects within a safety-driven culture.
	Continuous learning and professional development opportunities.
	Collaborative and inclusive work environment.


Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;recruitment@fortknoxoutsourcing.com&nbsp;using &ldquo;HSE Manager &ndash; Lagos&rdquo; as the subject of the email.",
  "datePosted": "2025-11-01",
  "validThrough": "2025-12-01",
  "employmentType": "Full-Time",

    "@type": "Organization",

Health, Safety, and Environment (HSE) Manager Job at Fort Knox Outsourcing Limited




        
    

        
        Fort Knox Outsourcing Limited - Our client, a leading player in the construction and engineering sector, is recruiting proactive and experienced candidates to develop, implement, and maintain effective safety policies and programs across all project sites in the capacity below:

Job Position:  Health, Safety, and Environment (HSE) Manager

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

About the Role
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	The ideal candidate will have 4 - 5 years of relevant experience in HSE management, ensuring compliance with local regulations, company standards, and international best practices to promote a safe and sustainable work environment.


Key Responsibilities


	Develop, implement, and monitor HSE policies, systems, and procedures across project sites.
	Conduct risk assessments, safety audits, and inspections to identify potential hazards and ensure preventive measures.
	Promote a strong safety culture through employee training, awareness programs, and engagement initiatives.
	Ensure compliance with regulatory standards (DPR, NESREA, ISO, OSHA, etc.) and company safety policies.
	Investigate incidents, accidents, and near misses; prepare reports and recommend corrective actions.
	Coordinate emergency response plans and ensure readiness for workplace incidents.
	Liaise with contractors, regulatory bodies, and project managers on all safety-related matters.
	Maintain accurate HSE documentation and prepare periodic reports for management review.


Qualifications & Experience


	Bachelor’s Degree in Environmental Science, Engineering, Occupational Health & Safety, or a related field.
	4 - 5 years of proven experience in a similar HSE role (preferably within construction, oil & gas, or engineering projects).
	Certification in NEBOSH, IOSH, ISO 45001, or equivalent is a strong advantage.
	Excellent knowledge of HSE regulations, audits, and risk management procedures.
	Strong leadership, communication, and team coordination skills.
	Ability to influence and drive compliance across all organizational levels.


What We Offer


	Competitive compensation and benefits package.
	Exposure to high-impact projects within a safety-driven culture.
	Continuous learning and professional development opportunities.
	Collaborative and inclusive work environment.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: recruitment@fortknoxoutsourcing.com using “HSE Manager – Lagos” as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply

Cashier Job at K & S Conduit Consulting Services Limited




        
    

        
        K & S Conduit Consulting Services Limited empowers individuals and organizations through innovative, data-driven consulting services in HR, management, education, and project execution—enabling sustainable success and growth. Our Vision Statement is to be a recognized leader in multidisciplinary consulting across Africa, known for excellence, integrity, and impactful solutions that shape future-ready businesses and institutions.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Cashier
Job Location: Jabi, Abuja (FCT)
Employment Type: Full-time
Sector: Retail Pharmacy

Requirements
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Minimum qualification of ND in Accounting, Business Administration, or related field.
	Minimum of 2 years post-NYSC experience as a cashier, preferably in a retail or pharmacy environment.
	Proficiency with POS systems and Microsoft Excel.
	Excellent numeracy, communication, and record-keeping skills.
	Integrity, accuracy, and attention to detail are essential.


Work schedule:


	(Mondays- Fridays)
	Morning shift: 7am-3pm
	Afternoon shift: 2pm- 10pm
	(Alternate Weekends).


Benefits


	Salary: N70,000 - N80,000 Monthly.
	Performance bonus
	End-of-year bonus


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: k.sconduitconsulting@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.    

    

        Click here to Apply
